attributes.action: Bring back Child safety advertisements on TV
attributes.additional_details:
In the light of recent events surrounding the disappearance of 5 year old April Jones is it not time we brought back public safety adverts for children on television.

As a child in the 80s I still remember 'Charlie says' telling us about not going with strangers and with TV being more popular with children than ever, shouldn't we be helping to educate our children about the dangers that exist out there through the medium of TV?

As the mother of two young children I would welcome the return of such campaigns
